\usepackage{amsmath,amsfonts,bm}
\def\ra{{\textnormal{a}}}
\newcommand{\reals}{\mathbb{R}}



The Stieltjes transform is a fundamental object in probability and has played a particularly prominent role in Random Matrix Theory. In this note we will explore and highlight some of its properties. [@lap-revisited]

$$\ra$$, 
$$\reals$$
